      • makeFile

        protected java.io.File makeFile(org.apereo.cas.services.RegisteredService service)
        Creates a file for a registered service. The file is named as [SERVICE-NAME]-[SERVICE-ID]-.{@value #getExtension()}
        参数:
        service - Registered service.
        返回:
        file in service registry directory.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file name is invalid
